sentences.english: A side-view brain scan reveals a brain tumor.
sentences.chinese: 腦側面掃描顯示了一個腦腫瘤。

sentences.english: Symptoms of cerebral edema mirror other brain conditions such as tumors and concussions.
sentences.chinese: 腦水腫可誘發其他大腦疾病，如腦腫瘤和腦震盪。

sentences.english: Current advances of gene-therapy combined with radiotherapy for malignant glioma have been reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡述惡性腦腫瘤基因治療，聯合放射治療的現狀。

sentences.english: Results Most of the lesions were misdiagnosed preoperatively as cerebral neoplasms.
sentences.chinese: 結果多數病變術前誤診爲腦腫瘤。

sentences.english: The results of Parsa's work may have implications beyond brain tumors.
sentences.chinese: Parsa工作結果的意義可能超過了腦腫瘤。

sentences.english: Fewer than 4% of brain tumours present with a headache.
sentences.chinese: 不超過4%的腦腫瘤患者伴有頭痛症狀。

sentences.english: Subdural hematomas or brain tumors may be treated surgically .
sentences.chinese: 硬膜下血腫或腦腫瘤則需進行外科手術。

definition: to show an effect/to produce an effect/a conspicuous effect
lit. people rebelling and friends deserting (idiom)/fig. to find oneself utterly isolated
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
